item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Gavins Pub & Restaurant!!!!

Gavins is the latest addition to the South Water Street restaurant scene, opening last August, it has a definitively retro vibe making it pretty different from the other South Water Street establishments. Inside the retro vibe is reinforced with a stainless steel and riveted panels and club chairs reminiscent of WWII aircraft, but softened by low lighting and tasteful pinup girl paintings by local artist, Ian M. Gaudreau. It has a large bar, and by the looks of it the food is good too. The best recommendation I've seen so far is for the incredible quesadillas! The drinks look pretty interesting too! So, since they're open Monday nights and we HAVEN'T been here yet, it's high time! Let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever. Not even hurricanes (Sandy was an exception!)
item.how_to_find_us: We're hard to miss!!! Just in case, I'll be wearing the brown and pink scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Gavins Pub & Restaurant!!!
